remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping> class provides a mapping between the namespace specified in your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source and a prefix you specify that you can use in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
